name: Made by Many
description:
Made by Many is an innovation consultancy that places equal focus on strategy and execution. We’ve created a world-class design and engineering capability so that we can test ideas in the market quickly and help our clients identify the right digital strategy, grow their own capabilities and scale. Everything we do is part of a collaborative process that brings technology, culture and people together to drive lasting change and place digital at the core of our clients’ businesses.
Made by Many works through the entire innovation cycle. We’re headquartered in London but operate across the globe. We’re always happy to hear from interested partners and from talented strategists, engineers, designers and product managers.
READ MORE...
